description: Protect Your New Apple iPad Mini / iPad Mini 2 with Retina Display Tablet, with i-Blason Bubble Free Screen protector!i-Blason Bubble Free Screen Protectorsprovide the highest transparency while still delivering scratch resistant protection for your New Apple iPad Mini Tablet Retina Display with amazing patent pending bubble free technology which enables you to apply the screen protectors in seconds!Misalignment? No Worries. Just remove the bubble free screen protector, re-align and reapply. You are good to go. Just as simple as that.All i-Blason Screen protectors are made of the highest quality Japanese PET Film available with 100% Bubble-Free Silicon Adhesives.Every i-Blason Screen Protector is backed by thei-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY!COMPATIBILITY:Apple Mini / iPad Mini 2 with Retina DisplayThe i-Blason Screen Protector Kit Includes:- One i-Blason HD Clear Bubble Free Screen Protector- Installation Instructions- Microfiber Polishing Cloth- Retail Packagingi-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTYWe are committed to your satisfaction and will send you replacements free of charge for:- Installation Problems such as bubbles or other user error- Scratched or damaged screen protectors- Wear and TearOur commitment to you is that we will keep your device protected, i-Blason Bubble Free Guaranteed, or your money back.
title: i-Blason Apple iPad Mini / iPad Mini with Retina Display (2nd Generation) HD Matte Bubble Free Screen Protector Reusable HD Clear Anti Glare (White)
